name: Alec Bradley - Nica Puro Rosado - Torpedo
additionalNotes: Alec Bradley Nica Puro Rosado is no exception with a blissful all-Nicaraguan recipe of long-filler tobaccos patiently handcrafted beneath a glistening Rosado wrapper leaf. Medium to full-bodied notes of chestnuts, cashews, leather and black pepper deliver an approachable, mouthwatering aftertaste with inspiring aromas.
